recipe.name: Chocolate Pudding
recipe.ingredients: 2 cups half-and-half 1 tablespoon vanilla extract 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 cup milk 1/4 cup cornstarch 1/3 cup sugar 4 ounces dark chocolate

step.describe: Fix the blending paddle into the bowl . Add half-and half, vanilla extract, and salt while the machine is hot.
Combine the milk, cornstarch, and sugar in measuring cup. Whisk to combine.
Start the program, with 1 minute left, while the machine is running, add the above mixture to the bowl from the lid hole.
Mixture should be thick. Break or chop the chocolate into small pieces. Add the chocolate to the mixing bowl. Wait 1 minute.

Strain, if desired, to remove any cornstarch lumps. Pour into storage container. Place piece of plastic directly on top of the warm pudding to keep a skin from forming. Refrigerate until chilled. Serve cold.
